name: Textarea

properties1.name: name
properties1.description: (mandatory) is the unique name of the field.

properties2.name: label
properties2.description: (mandatory) (translatable) is the descriptive title of the field.

properties3.name: rows
properties3.description: (mandatory) is the height of the visible text area in lines. If omitted the width is determined by the browser. The value of rows does not limit the number of lines that may be entered.

properties4.name: cols
properties4.description: (mandatory) is the width of the visible text area in characters. If omitted the width is determined by the browser. The value of cols does not limit the number of characters that may be entered.

properties6.name: description
properties6.description: (optional) (translatable) is text that will be shown as a tooltip when the user moves the mouse over the label.

properties7.name: message
properties7.description: (optional) (translatable) is text that will be shown as error on validation.

properties8.name: class
properties8.description: (optional) is a CSS class name for the HTML form field. If omitted this will default to 'text_area'.

properties9.name: filter
properties9.description: (optional) allow the system to save certain html tags or raw data.

properties10.name: hint
properties10.description: (optional) The placeholder to display inside the textarea.

properties11.name: required
properties11.description: (optional) The field must be filled before submitting the form.

properties12.name: validate
properties12.description: (optional) The validation method for the form field.  This value will determine which method is used to validate the value for a field.

properties13.name: readonly
properties13.description: (optional) The field cannot be changed and will automatically inherit the default value

properties14.name: disabled
properties14.description: (optional) The field cannot be changed and will automatically inherit the default value - it will also not submit

properties15.name: showon
properties15.description: (optional) Allows you to hide the field based on the value(s) of another field; for Joomla 3.2.4+ https://joomla.stackexchange.com/a/17682/2166

description: The textarea form field type provides a multi-line input area for entering larger blocks of text. If a saved value exists, it is displayed when the page first loads; otherwise, the default value (if specified) is used. This field is ideal for content such as descriptions, comments, or notes.
